doc.field: International Federation of Professional and Technical Engineers, Local 66 Records
International Federation of Professional and Technical Engineers, Local 66 Records

Marble Industry Employers' Association: (includes Cullo, Grand, Gray, Scolaro Marble companies): Arbitration following industry-wide strike. A short history is included with memos, affidavits. Union was ruled down for an industry-wide contract with the Association. Recognition was won in only four shops. (See also Box 29/14)

Marble Industry Employers' Association: (includes Cullo, Grand, Gray, Scolaro Marble companies): Arbitration following industry-wide strike. A short history is included with memos, affidavits. Union was ruled down for an industry-wide contract with the Association. Recognition was won in only four shops. (See also Box 29/14)

Series IV: Shop Files, 1937-1979 >> Marble Industry Employers' Association: (includes Cullo, Grand, Gray, Scolaro Marble companies): Arbitration following industry-wide strike. A short history is included with memos, affidavits. Union was ruled down for an industry-wide contract with the Association. Recognition was won in only four shops. (See also Box 29/14)

Marble Industry Employers' Association: (includes Cullo, Grand, Gray, Scolaro Marble companies): Arbitration following industry-wide strike. A short history is included with memos, affidavits. Union was ruled down for an industry-wide contract with the Association. Recognition was won in only four shops. (See also Box 29/14)
